title: softmax doesn't support negative dimensions
body_html:
on 0.2.0+502aaf3 (can't try on master because of #3669):

import torch

torch.nn.functional.softmax(torch.autograd.Variable(torch.Tensor(1,2,3,4).cuda()), dim = -1)
#Traceback (most recent call last):
# File "<stdin>", line 1, in <module>
#  File ".../lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/nn/functional.py", line 768, in softmax
#    return torch._C._nn.softmax(input, dim)
#RuntimeError: invalid argument 4: dim out of range (got -1, but input has 4 dims) at .../pytorch/aten/src/THCUNN/generic/SoftMax.cu:15

torch.nn.functional.softmax(torch.autograd.Variable(torch.Tensor(1,2,3,4).cuda()), dim = 3) # works
body_text:
on 0.2.0+502aaf3 (can't try on master because of #3669):
import torch

torch.nn.functional.softmax(torch.autograd.Variable(torch.Tensor(1,2,3,4).cuda()), dim = -1)
#Traceback (most recent call last):
# File "<stdin>", line 1, in <module>
#  File ".../lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/nn/functional.py", line 768, in softmax
#    return torch._C._nn.softmax(input, dim)
#RuntimeError: invalid argument 4: dim out of range (got -1, but input has 4 dims) at .../pytorch/aten/src/THCUNN/generic/SoftMax.cu:15

torch.nn.functional.softmax(torch.autograd.Variable(torch.Tensor(1,2,3,4).cuda()), dim = 3) # works
body:
on 0.2.0+502aaf3 (can't try on master because of https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/3669):
```python
import torch

torch.nn.functional.softmax(torch.autograd.Variable(torch.Tensor(1,2,3,4).cuda()), dim = -1)
#Traceback (most recent call last):
# File "<stdin>", line 1, in <module>
#  File ".../lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/nn/functional.py", line 768, in softmax
#    return torch._C._nn.softmax(input, dim)
#RuntimeError: invalid argument 4: dim out of range (got -1, but input has 4 dims) at .../pytorch/aten/src/THCUNN/generic/SoftMax.cu:15

torch.nn.functional.softmax(torch.autograd.Variable(torch.Tensor(1,2,3,4).cuda()), dim = 3) # works
```
